statements: UPDATE customer_geo_data SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customer_geo_data SET customer_location=POINT(-74.0060, 40.7128) WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_geo_data SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1
UPDATE customer_geo_data SET customer_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.349014 47.620206)', 4326) WHERE customer_id = 2
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='Alice' WHERE customer_id=1
UPDATE stores SET location='POINT(10 20)' WHERE store_name='Store A'
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(1 2)') WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE stores SET location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(3 4)'), store_name = 'Example Store' WHERE store_id = 2;
UPDATE offers SET name='Special Summer Sale' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE stores SET rating=4.7, recommended_offer_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE id='323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE offers SET name = 'New Offer Name', location = 'POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)' WHERE id = '8aee53ea-2f3a-4f0d-bc5e-5ee5ff68b248';
UPDATE stores SET rating = 4.5, recommended_offer_id = '07536140-47a3-4b60-8021-41da9b9fc8b4' WHERE id = 'a823f570-4671-4876-8c25-3820ed354a74';
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='123-456-7890', email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE offers SET discount=0.2, end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE offer_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE offers SET discount = 0.2, start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE offer_id = 5;
UPDATE Customers SET name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Offers SET description='Limited time offer!', validity_period='2023-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE offer_id=2;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE Offers SET location_constraint = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.335167 47.608013)'), description = 'Updated Description' WHERE offer_id = 456
